text: ninnal talvarayute atutta bhagattum avar akanna bhagattum kaccavatasangham ninnalkku ‎taleyumaya sandarbhanna. ninnal parasparam errumuttan neratte tirumaniccirunnenkil ‎ninnalatinu virud'dhamayi pravarttinakkumayirunnu. ennal urappayum untakenta oru karyam ‎natappil varuttanan allahu innane ceytat. athava nasikkentavan vyaktamaya ‎teliveate nasikkanum jivikkentavan vyaktamaya teliveate jivikkanum ventiyanit. ‎allahu ellam kelkkuinnavanum ariyunnavanum tanne; tircce. ‎
